member.name: P:MatterHackers.VectorMath.Vector4.Length
member.summary: Gets the length (magnitude) of the vector.

member.name: P:MatterHackers.VectorMath.Vector4.LengthFast
member.summary: Gets an approximation of the vector length (magnitude).
member.remarks: This property uses an approximation of the square root function to calculate vector magnitude, with an upper error bound of 0.001.

member.name: P:MatterHackers.VectorMath.Vector4.LengthSquared
member.summary: Gets the square of the vector length (magnitude).
member.remarks: This property avoids the costly square root operation required by the Length property. This makes it more suitable for comparisons.
